title: Parcel Management System
description: A full stack parcel tracking app with real-time status updates and payment gateway integration.

title: Recipe Booking Website
description: Recipe Book is virtual platform that showcased recipes all over the world for all food enthusiasts and People have access to add, manage, update and delete recipes and also users explore reactions on their added recipes to Recipe Book.

title: Lawyer Booking Application (Law BD)
description: Law BD a Bangladeshi lawyer booking web application displaying lawyers info with their availability. People Can schedule metting or cancel scheduled metting with any lawyers if they are available. In the near update Law BD will have dedicated role based registration system where any users can resgister to our application by their own fullfilling our conditions. Also their will be different payment system available to pay lawyer fee for the users and more

title: Study Mate
description: Study Mate is an online web application focusing to build a community for students. Here at the Study Mate students can explore tasks submitted by others, add tasks by their own, participate in tasks, find study partners. The environment of the Study Mate is totally aligned to study. No more wastage of times, distruction, no loses, only focused with 100% of productivity
